original_text: Now you have looked through everything that I have. Did you find anything that belongs to you? If you have found anything, put it here. Then your relatives and my relatives can see it. Our relatives can decide which of us is right, you or me!’
korean_text: 외삼촌께서 내 물건을 다 뒤져보셨으니 외삼촌의 집안 물건 중에서 무엇을 찾아내었나이까 여기 내 형제와 외삼촌의 형제 앞에 그것을 두고 우리 둘 사이에 판단하게 하소서

sentences.original_text: Now you have looked through everything that I have.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 당신은 내가 가진 모든 것을 살펴보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Did you find anything that belongs to you?
If you have found anything, put it here.
Then your relatives and my relatives can see it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신의 친척들과 나의 친척들이 그것을 볼 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Our relatives can decide which of us is right, you or me!
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 친척들이 우리 중 누가 옳은지, 당신인지 나인지 결정할 수 있습니다!
